results.title: Differential efficiency of simvastatin and lipoic acid treatments on Bothrops jararaca envenomation-induced acute kidney injury in mice.
results.text_hl: LA mitigated the hypercreatinemia, but exacerbated the urinary @CHEMICAL_Urea @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014508 @@@urea@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@, whereas @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SA@@@ mitigated the decrease of plasma @CHEMICAL_Urea @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014508 @@@urea@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014548 @@@urinary hyperosmolality@@@ and hypercreatinuria induced by vBj.
